text: Baby Rani Maurya (born 15 August 1956) is an Indian politician. She was the seventh Governor of Uttarakhand from 26 August 2018 to 15 September 2021. She started her political career with the Bharatiya Janata Party in the early 1990s. She was the first woman mayor of Agra from 1995 to 2000. From 2002 until 2005, she was on the National Commission for Women. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Uttarakhand
title: Baby Rani Maurya
